skillTree.localised_description: Furtive, scheming, sly, cunning, underhand, devious, conniving, double-dealing, and sneaky - valuable traits if you wish to stay alive!
All Skaven are unprincipled and untrustworthy by their foul natures. However, this is rarely a disadvantage in the face of the enemy.
Violence bordering on absolute delirium; 'berserk' doesn't even come close.
Ghoritch has always dominated Hell Pit’s blood-soaked arenas and now oversees his successors, keeping the other monsters fresh for war.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +8 for Monster units
	(all units in army)

Recruit rank: +1 for Monstrous Infantry and Monster units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: Giant snipping blades driven by Warpstone-driven pistons replace the Rat Ogre claws of Ghoritch’s heavily modified host body.
You can take the Northman out of Chaos, but you can’t take Chaos out of the Northman.
A Berserker has a tad more cognitive ability than a Rat Ogre – the mind of the former at least allows one to be a semi-competent quartermaster!

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +150
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: As it turns out, leading a Norscan clan and commanding a pack of monsters are not that different from one another.
The Unclean one may be less than pleased about his masterwork’s meteoric rise, but the two share a flimsy alliance nonetheless.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: Whether by attachment or mutation, something nasty and spiky on your tail has got to bring no little advantage in battle.
"Stay in one place, gods-damn you!"
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
This one fights with a fervour to be both admired and despised.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 5
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 10
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 25

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 1
Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 2
Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: A unique combination of shrewd military intellect and raw brute strength has ascended Ghoritch to Clan Moulder’s most exalted military rank.
